pages.text: The mace is a fairly inelegant weapon. It consists of a heavy weight, often with added spikes, on the end of a stick. Really, its basically little more than a club. $(br2) That said, it is impossible to deny the efficacy of the mace. Its heavy impact allows it to penetrate armor to a limited degree, meaning that it is highly effective against armored foes.

In terms of raw damage, the mace is similar to the sword. However, its extra weight reduces its effective speed, balancing its anti-armor potential. As such, the mace is best used against armored targets, with the effect becoming more pronounced as the level of armor increases.
